name: weave
title: Weave API
description: Lets you register, view and manage cloud ready devices.

fields.description: Selector specifying which fields to include in a partial response.

key.description: API key. Your API key identifies your project and provides you with API access, quota, and reports. Required unless you provide an OAuth 2.0 token.

oauth_token.description: OAuth 2.0 token for the current user.

prettyPrint.description: Returns response with indentations and line breaks.

quotaUser.description: Available to use for quota purposes for server-side applications. Can be any arbitrary string assigned to a user, but should not exceed 40 characters. Overrides userIp if both are provided.

userIp.description: IP address of the site where the request originates. Use this if you want to enforce per-user limits.

https://www.googleapis.com/auth/weave.ap.description: Access and manage your authorized Weave devices

AclEntriesListResponse.description: List of Access control list entries.

aclEntries.description: The actual list of ACL entries.

kind.description: Identifies what kind of resource this is. Value: the fixed string "weave#aclEntriesListResponse".

nextPageToken.description: Token corresponding to the next page of ACL entries.

totalResults.description: The total number of ACL entries for the query. The number of items in a response may be smaller due to paging.

cloudAccessRevoked.description: Indicates whether the AclEntry has been revoked from the cloud and the user has no cloud access, but they still might have local auth tokens that are valid and can access the device and execute commands locally. See localAccessInfo for local auth details.

creatorEmail.description: User who created this entry. At the moment it is populated only when pending == true.

delegator.description: User on behalf of whom the access is granted to the application.

key.description: Public access key value. Set only when scopeType is PUBLIC.

kind.description: Identifies what kind of resource this is. Value: the fixed string "weave#aclEntry".

localAccessInfo.description: Information about local auth tokens timestamps.

pending.description: Whether this ACL entry is pending for user reply to accept/reject it.

privileges.description:
Set of access privileges granted for this scope.

Valid values are:  
- "modifyAcl" 
- "viewAllEvents"

revocationTimeMs.description: Time in milliseconds since Unix Epoch indicating when the AclEntry was revoked.

role.description: Access role granted to this scope.

scopeId.description: Email address if scope type is user or group, domain name if scope type is a domain.

scopeMembership.description: Type of membership the user has in the scope.

scopePhotoUrl.description: URL of this scope displayable photo.

activateUrl.description: URL to adapter web flow to activate the adapter. Deprecated, use the activationUrl returned in the response of the Adapters.activate API.

activated.description: Whether this adapter has been activated for the current user.

deactivateUrl.description: URL to adapter web flow to disconnect the adapter. Deprecated, the adapter will be notified via pubsub.

iconUrl.description: URL to an icon that represents the adapter.

manageUrl.description: URL to adapter web flow to connect new devices. Only used for adapters that cannot automatically detect new devices. This field is returned only if the user has already activated the adapter.

kind.description: Identifies what kind of resource this is. Value: the fixed string "weave#adaptersAcceptResponse".

activationId.description: An ID that represents the link between the adapter and the user. The activationUrl will give this ID to the adapter for use in the accept API.

activationUrl.description: A URL to the adapter where the user should go to complete the activation. The URL contains the activationId and the user's email address.

kind.description: Identifies what kind of resource this is. Value: the fixed string "weave#adaptersActivateResponse".

deletedCount.description: The number of devices that were deleted.

kind.description: Identifies what kind of resource this is. Value: the fixed string "weave#adaptersDeactivateResponse".
Identifies what kind of resource this is. Value: the fixed string "weave#adaptersListResponse".

Application.description: Contains information about a recommended application for a device model.

androidApps.description: Android apps authorized under this project ID.

displayName.description: The display name of the app.

kind.description: Identifies what kind of resource this is. Value: the fixed string "weave#authorizedApp".

AuthorizedAppsCreateAppAuthenticationTok.description: Generate a token used to authenticate an authorized app.

kind.description: Identifies what kind of resource this is. Value: the fixed string "weave#authorizedAppsCreateAppAuthenticationTokenResponse".

token.description: Generated authentication token for an authorized app.

kind.description: Identifies what kind of resource this is. Value: the fixed string "weave#authorizedAppsListResponse".

id.description: ID of the notification. This id is generated sequentially starting from 0 within a subscription.

kind.description: Identifies what kind of resource this is. Value: the fixed string "weave#clientNotification".

subscriptionId.description: The subscription for which this notification is sent for.

creationTimeMs.description: Timestamp since epoch of a creation of a command.

creatorEmail.description: User that created the command (not applicable if the user is deleted).

deviceId.description: Device ID that this command belongs to.

arguments.description: Positional error arguments used for error message formatting.

message.description: User-visible error message populated by the cloud based on command name and error code.

expirationTimeMs.description: Timestamp since epoch of command expiration.

expirationTimeoutMs.description: Expiration timeout for the command since its creation, 10 seconds min, 30 days max.

kind.description: Identifies what kind of resource this is. Value: the fixed string "weave#command".

userAction.description: Pending command state that is not acknowledged by the device yet.

kind.description: Identifies what kind of resource this is. Value: the fixed string "weave#commandsListResponse".

nextPageToken.description: Token for the next page of commands.

totalResults.description: The total number of commands for the query. The number of items in a response may be smaller due to paging.

certFingerprint.description: The HTTPS certificate fingerprint used to secure communication with device..

connectionStatusHint.description: Connection status hint, set by parent device.

gcmRegistrationId.description: GCM registration ID. Required if device supports GCM delivery channel.

gcmSenderId.description: GCM sender ID. For Chrome apps must be the same as sender ID during registration, usually API project ID.

parentId.description: Parent device ID (aggregator) if it exists.

connectionStatusHint.description: Device's connection status, as set by the pubsub subscriber.

topic.description: Pubsub topic to publish to with device notifications.

commandDefs.description: Description of commands supported by the device. This field is writable only by devices.

components.description: Hierarchical componenet-based modeling of the device.

creationTimeMs.description: Timestamp of creation of this device in milliseconds since epoch UTC.

description.description: User readable description of this device.

deviceKind.description: Device kind. Deprecated, provide "modelManifestId" instead. See list of device kinds values.

deviceLocalId.description: The ID of the device for use on the local network.

invitations.description: List of pending invitations for the currently logged-in user.

isEventRecordingDisabled.description: Indicates whether event recording is enabled or disabled for this device.

kind.description: Identifies what kind of resource this is. Value: the fixed string "weave#device".

lastSeenTimeMs.description: Timestamp of the last request from this device in milliseconds since epoch UTC. Supported only for devices with XMPP channel type.

lastUpdateTimeMs.description: Timestamp of the last device update in milliseconds since epoch UTC.

lastUseTimeMs.description: Timestamp of the last device usage in milliseconds since epoch UTC.

location.description: User readable location of the device (name of the room, office number, building/floor, etc).

modelManifest.description: Device model information provided by the model manifest of this device.

modelManifestId.description: Model manifest ID of this device.

name.description: Name of this device provided by the manufacturer.

owner.description: E-mail address of the device owner.

personalizedInfo.description: Personalized device information for currently logged-in user.

lastUseTimeMs.description: Timestamp of the last device usage by the user in milliseconds since epoch UTC.

maxRole.description: The maximum role on the device.

placesHints.description: Hints for device's room and place names.

placesProposal.description: Weave proposals for device's room and place names.

serialNumber.description: Serial number of a device provided by its manufacturer.

state.description: Device state. This field is writable only by devices.

stateDefs.description: Description of the device state. This field is writable only by devices.

uiDeviceKind.description: Device kind from the model manifest used in UI applications. See list of device kinds values.

DeviceStatePatchesStatePatch.description: Device state patch with corresponding timestamp.

timeMs.description: Timestamp of a change. Local time, UNIX timestamp or time since last boot can be used.

kind.description: Identifies what kind of resource this is. Value: the fixed string "weave#devicesCreateLocalAuthTokensResponse".
Identifies what kind of resource this is. Value: the fixed string "weave#devicesListResponse".

nextPageToken.description: Token corresponding to the next page of devices.

totalResults.description: The total number of devices for the query. The number of items in a response may be smaller due to paging.

patches.description: The list of state patches with corresponding timestamps.

requestTimeMs.description: Timestamp of a request. Local time, UNIX timestamp or time since last boot can be used.

localAuthInfo.description: The local auth info of the device.

kind.description: Identifies what kind of resource this is. Value: the fixed string "weave#devicesUpsertLocalAuthInfoResponse".

connectionStatus.description: New device connection state (if connectivity change event).

deviceId.description: The device that was affected by this event.

kind.description: Identifies what kind of resource this is. Value: the fixed string "weave#event".

timeMs.description: Time the event was generated in milliseconds since epoch UTC.

userEmail.description: User that caused the event (if applicable).

events.description: The actual list of events in reverse chronological order.

kind.description: Identifies what kind of resource this is. Value: the fixed string "weave#eventsListResponse".

nextPageToken.description: Token for the next page of events.

totalResults.description: The total number of events for the query. The number of items in a response may be smaller due to paging.

recordDeviceEvents.description: Flag to indicate whether recording should be enabled or disabled.

aclEntry.description: ACL entry associated with this invitation.

creatorEmail.description: Email of a user who created this invitation.

JsonValue.description: JSON value -- union over JSON value types.

isApp.description: Whether this belongs to a delegated app or user.

projectId.description: Project id of the app that this access info is associated with.

localAccessEntry.description: A snapshot of the access entry used at the time of minting.

localAuthTokenMintTimeMs.description: Time in milliseconds since unix epoch of when the local auth token was minted.

localAuthTokenTimeLeftMs.description: Relative time left of token after API call.

localAuthTokenTtlTimeMs.description: Time in milliseconds of hold long the token is valid after minting.

allowedChildModelManifestIds.description: For gateways, a list of device ids that are allowed to connect to it.

applications.description: List of applications recommended to use with a device model.

confirmationImageUrl.description: URL of image showing a confirmation button.

deviceKind.description: Device kind, see "deviceKind" field of the Device resource. See list of device kinds values.

kind.description: Identifies what kind of resource this is. Value: the fixed string "weave#modelManifest".

oemName.description: User readable name of device model manufacturer.

kind.description: Identifies what kind of resource this is. Value: the fixed string "weave#modelManifestsListResponse".

modelManifests.description: The actual list of model manifests.

nextPageToken.description: Token corresponding to the next page of model manifests.

totalResults.description: The total number of model manifests for the query. The number of items in a response may be smaller due to paging.

kind.description: Identifies what kind of resource this is. Value: the fixed string "weave#commandDef".

minimalRole.description: Minimal role required to execute command.

id.description: Unique personalizedInfo ID. Value: the fixed string "me".

kind.description: Identifies what kind of resource this is. Value: the fixed string "weave#personalizedInfo".

lastUseTimeMs.description: Timestamp of the last device usage by the user in milliseconds since epoch UTC.

member.description: Email of the new member of the place.

kind.description: Identifies what kind of resource this is. Value: the fixed string "weave#placesAddMemberResponse".
Identifies what kind of resource this is. Value: the fixed string "weave#placesCreateResponse".
Identifies what kind of resource this is. Value: the fixed string "weave#placesHandleInvitationResponse".
Identifies what kind of resource this is. Value: the fixed string "weave#placesListResponse".

deviceSuggestions.description: Suggestions for places and rooms for a device.

kind.description: Identifies what kind of resource this is. Value: the fixed string "weave#placesModifyResponse".

member.description: Email of the member to be removed.

kind.description: Identifies what kind of resource this is. Value: the fixed string "weave#placesRemoveMemberResponse".

creationTimeMs.description: Creation timestamp of the registration ticket in milliseconds since epoch UTC.

deviceDraft.description: Draft of the device being registered.

deviceId.description: ID that device will have after registration is successfully finished.

errorCode.description: Error code. Set only on device registration failures.

expirationTimeMs.description: Expiration timestamp of the registration ticket in milliseconds since epoch UTC.

kind.description: Identifies what kind of resource this is. Value: the fixed string "weave#registrationTicket".

oauthClientId.description: OAuth 2.0 client ID of the device.

parentId.description: Parent device ID (aggregator) if it exists.

robotAccountAuthorizationCode.description: Authorization code that can be exchanged to a refresh token.

robotAccountEmail.description: E-mail address of robot account assigned to the registered device.

kind.description: Identifies what kind of resource this is. Value: the fixed string "weave#roomsListResponse".
Identifies what kind of resource this is. Value: the fixed string "weave#stateDef".

minimalRole.description: Minimal role required to view state.

expirationTimeMs.description: Timestamp in milliseconds since epoch when the subscription expires and new notifications stop being sent.

kind.description: Identifies what kind of resource this is. Value: the fixed string "weave#subscription".

expirationTimeMs.description: Timestamp in milliseconds since epoch when the subscription expires and new notifications stop being sent.

filters.description:
Subscription event filter.

Acceptable values are:  
- "myDevices" 
- "myCommands"

gcmSenderId.description: For Chrome apps must be the same as sender ID during registration, usually API project ID.

kind.description: Identifies what kind of resource this is. Value: the fixed string "weave#oldSubscription".
Identifies what kind of resource this is. Value: the fixed string "weave#subscriptionsGetNotificationsResponse".
Identifies what kind of resource this is. Value: the fixed string "weave#subscriptionsListResponse".

accept.description: Used by an adapter provider to accept an activation and prevent it from expiring.

activationId.description: The ID of the activation to accept. This represents a Weave user.

activate.description: Activates an adapter. The activation will be contingent upon the adapter provider accepting the activation. If the activation is not accepted within 15 minutes, the activation will be deleted.

adapterId.description: The ID of the adapter to activate.

deactivate.description: Deactivates an adapter. This will also delete all devices provided by that adapter.

adapterId.description: The ID of the adapter to deactivate.

createAppAuthenticationToken.description: Generate a token used to authenticate an authorized app.

list.description: The actual list of authorized apps.

attachmentPath.description: Path to the blob inside the command, for now only two values are supported: "parameters" and "results".

getQueue.description: Returns queued commands that device is supposed to execute. This method may be used only by devices.

hl.description: Specifies the language code that should be used for text values in the API response.

insert.description: Creates and sends a new command.

executeAfter.description: ID of the command that was sent before this command. Use this to ensure the order of commands.

hl.description: Specifies the language code that should be used for text values in the API response.

responseAwaitMs.description: Number of milliseconds to wait for device response before returning.

list.description: Lists all commands in reverse order of creation.

byUser.description: List all the commands issued by the user. Special value 'me' can be used to list by the current user.
